original: HELLBERG, Frans Fredric, Direktör, Stockholm, f Godegård, Ögl, 4/12 83 av lantbr F J Pettersson o Albertina Hellberg, gm Anna-Lisa Rheborg (d). Folksk, hdlssk, språksk. Anst på Philip Carlsons Exportkont 98—99, h Herm Lamm 99—01, h Paul U Bergströms AB sed. 01, dir där, styr.led sed. 20. Styr.ordf Drottninggatans Frn Sthlm. Resor: Tyskl 06, USA 25, årl t bl a Tyskl, Engl, Frankr, Ital, Österr, Ung, Schweiz, Holl, Belg 11—40. Patr-stGM, Frimurare, Sthlms Köpm.klb. °HELLBERG, Carl Hillard Christian, Handlande, Lindesberg, f Chicago USA 8/9 86, gm Liv Roed. Eft slut skolg anst s spec.bitr, ut-vandr t USA. Gr eg fma v återkomst t Sv, H Hellberg, spec, Lindesberg, 32, inneh dna. Led Lindesbergs köpm.frn.
translated: HELLBERG, Frans Fredric, Director, Stockholm, b. Godegård, Ögl, 12/4 1883, son of farmer F J Pettersson and Albertina Hellberg, married to Anna-Lisa Rheborg (deceased). Elementary school, commercial school, language school. Employed at Philip Carlsons Exportkont 1898-1899, Herm Lamm 1899-1901, Paul U Bergströms AB since 1901, director there, board member since 1920. Chairman of Drottninggatans Från Stockholm. Travel: Germany in 1906, USA in 1925, annual trips to Germany, England, France, Italy, Austria, Hungary, Switzerland, the Netherlands, and Belgium from 1911-1940. Patrernal great-grandfather, Freemason, member of Stockholm's Merchant Club.

structured.name: Frans Fredric Hellberg
structured.description: Frans Fredric Hellberg was a Director from Stockholm. He was born on December 4, 1883 in Godegård, Ögl. His parents were farmer F J Pettersson and Albertina Hellberg. Frans Fredric Hellberg was married to Anna-Lisa Rheborg (deceased). He attended elementary school, commercial school, and language school. Frans Fredric Hellberg was employed at Philip Carlsons Exportkont from 1898 to 1899, Herm Lamm from 1899 to 1901, and Paul U Bergströms AB from 1901 until his death. He held the position of director there and served as a board member starting from 1920. Frans Fredric Hellberg was also the Chairman of Drottninggatans Från Stockholm. He undertook several trips, including Germany in 1906 and USA in 1925. He made annual trips to various countries such as Germany, England, France, Italy, Austria, Hungary, Switzerland, the Netherlands, and Belgium from 1911 to 1940. Frans Fredric Hellberg's paternal great-grandfather was a Freemason and a member of Stockholm's Merchant Club.

career.occupational_title: Employed at Paul U Bergströms AB
Director at Paul U Bergströms AB
